opendial.utils

Class StringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.utils.StringUtils

  • public class StringUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Various utilities for manipulating strings
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

      • checkForm

        public static boolean checkForm(java.lang.String str,
                                boolean showMessage)
        Checks the form of the string to ensure that all parentheses, braces and brackets are balanced. Logs warning messages if problems are detected.
        Parameters:
        showMessage - whether to show an error message or not
        str - the string
        Returns:
        true if the form is correct, false otherwise

      • compare

        public static int compare(java.lang.String id1,
                          java.lang.String id2)
        Performs a lexicographic comparison of the two identifiers. If there is a difference between the number of primes in the two identifiers, returns it. Else, returns +1 if id1.compareTo(id2) is higher than 0, and -1 otherwise.
        Parameters:
        id1 - the first identifier
        id2 - the second identifier
        Returns:
        the result of the comparison

      • join

        public static java.lang.String join(java.util.Collection<? extends java.lang.Object> elements,
                                    java.lang.String jointure)
        Joins the string elements into a single string where the elements are joined by a specific string.
        Parameters:
        elements - the string elements
        jointure - the string used to join the elements
        Returns:
        the concatenated string.

      • getTableFromInput

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getTableFromInput(java.lang.String rawText)
        Returns a table with probabilities from the provided GUI input
        Parameters:
        rawText - the raw text expressing the table
        Returns:
        the string values together with their probabilities

      • countOccurrences

        public static int countOccurrences(java.lang.String fullString,
                                   java.lang.String pattern)
        Counts the occurrences of a particular pattern in the string.
        Parameters:
        fullString - the string to use
        pattern - the pattern to search for
        Returns:
        the number of occurrences.

        public static boolean isArithmeticExpression(java.lang.String exp)
        Returns true if the string corresponds to an arithmetic expression, and false otherwise
        Parameters:
        exp - the string to check
        Returns:
        true if the string is an arithmetic expression, false otherwise

        public static java.lang.String escape(java.lang.String init)

      • isPossibleRegex

        public static boolean isPossibleRegex(java.lang.String str)
        Checks whether the string could possibly represent a regular expression (this is just a first, fast guess, which will need to be verified by actually constructing the regex using the constructRegex method below).
        Parameters:
        str - the string
        Returns:
        true if the string is likely to be a regular expression, else false

      • constructRegex

        public static java.lang.String constructRegex(java.lang.String init)
        Formats the regular expression corresponding to the provided string
        Parameters:
        init - the initial string
        Returns:
        the corresponding expression
